My drive to work today

In chronological order

  • Greeted by an ammonia smell in my car!?!
  • A clown (literally) behind me, driving a beat up Ford Focus, talking on his phone.
  • I heard a track from “The Grey Album” on XM Radio. I guess EMI budged?
  • Saw a woman with a “Hang up and drive” bumper sticker talking on her cell phone.
  • Was reminded that Sunday is Father’s Day via a plane pulling a banner.

—Jun 17, 2004
